newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - H&Q maintains buy on Oracle.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - H&Q maintains buy on Oracle.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist maintains buy rating on Oracle Corp. Notes Q197 EPS of $0.17 a share in line with expectations.
-- Notes strong database growth offset by surprising drop off in applications, tools business continues weak.
-- New product cycles in intranet products, applications and tools, coupled with strong universal server acceptance, should feed pipeline throughout 1997.
-- revising estimates slightly downward based on new product mix assumptions.
-- Sees Q297 EPS of $0.26, Q397 of $0.30, Q497 of $0.54 and FY97 $1.26 a share.
